# execution_listenable class

> **来源**: https://dev.epicgames.com/documentation/en-us/fortnite/verse-api/versedotorg/scenegraph/execution_listenable
> **爬取时间**: 2025-12-27T00:53:44.984174

---

Users to subscribe to, or await on, a DeltaTime based callback from one of the phases in a component's `TickEvents` object.

|  |  |
| --- | --- |
| Verse `using` statement | `using { /Verse.org/SceneGraph }` |

## Members

This class has no members.
